settingPanel.renderFPSDesc: Danmakus rendering FPS. Setting 0 is no upper limit. If it is the old version of PIP or [Dual Video Mode] mode, the video will be affected by this
settingPanel.FPS_limitOffsetAccurate: FPS limiting algorithm uses precise now time
settingPanel.FPS_limitOffsetAccurateDesc: The default recorded last update time is now - (offset % renderFPS)
settingPanel.videoNoBorderDesc: When opening PIP, the video without black borders is automatically adjusted according to the previously saved window size.
settingPanel.videoSharpeningDesc: The effect is obvious when the PIP width is less than 800.
settingPanel.videoProgress_showDesc: Add a progress bar display under the non-live video
settingPanel.videoNoJudgeDurationInLiveDesc: If the video exceeds 60x60x5s, it is judged as a live broadcast. It is added to adapt to YouTube and Twitch live broadcasts. This setting may not be needed in the future.
settingPanel.performanceUpdateFrameDesc: Update info when trigger request in {val} times
settingPanel.saveHeightOnDocPIPCloseOffset: Save height offset when closing docPIP
settingPanel.saveHeightOnDocPIPCloseOffsetDesc: It's very strange on Chrome that when you open docPIP with a specified height, it will be 8px smaller. If it is still offset, you can adjust it.
settingPanel.saveWidthOnDocPIPCloseOffset: Save width offset when closing docPIP
settingPanel.saveWidthOnDocPIPCloseOffsetDesc: Same as [Save height offset when closing docPIP]
settingPanel.useHtmlDanmakuDesc: Better display effect, better massive danmakus and large font rendering performance than canvas. Back to canvas rendering in turn off
settingPanel.danSpeedDesc: Affected by [Canvas FPS limit], x+={val}/10 each time
settingPanel.fontShadowDesc: Better font render, but have serious performance issues in a large number of danmakus
settingPanel.adjustFontsizeByPIPWidthResizeDesc: When the picture-in-picture size is changed, the font size will be adjusted accordingly.
settingPanel.adjustFontsizeStartWidthDesc: At this width, the picture-in-picture is the size set by [Danmaku font size]. If it is smaller, the font will not be reduced. If it is larger, the font will be enlarged.
settingPanel.adjustFontsizeScaleRateDesc: Calculation formula: Actual font size = ${Danmaku font size} / ${Standard width} * ${Picture-in-Picture width at this time} * $val
settingPanel.adjustFontsizeMaxSizeDesc: Limit the maximum font size for resizing
settingPanel.biliVideoPakkuFilterDesc: Available in bilibili-evaolved open. Only filter & lower danmakus, no special feats
settingPanel.biliVideoDansFromBiliEvaolvedDesc: This pattern has a problem and cannot download the complete danmakus.
settingPanel.biliLiveSideDesc: Experimental feat. Open it with reactVP_canvasCs mode
settingPanel.useDocPIPDesc: Default true when your browser support
settingPanel.reactVP_canvasCsDesc: For the solution of video in iframe, the web video stream is drawn in canvas, which is consistent with the core of the old picture-in-picture and consumes more performance.
settingPanel.reactVP_csDesc: There is a problem that the frame rate is not as good as [Dual video mode], 60fps video is obvious
settingPanel.oVP_cs: Dual video mode, no canvas, origin video
settingPanel.unsupportDocPIPTips:
Your browser does not support the new picture-in-picture function. Please replace it with chrome/edge browser and the version is 116 or above
or check it in the browser chrome://flags/#document-picture-in-picture-api Whether the feature exists and is set to Enabled, then restart the browser
settingPanel.subtitle: Subtitle

popup.tips: Click on the web page to trigger picture-in-picture

floatButton.closeTips: You can reopen float button in extension menu

vp.danmakuTimeOffsetTips: Currently only support in [HTML render danmakus]
